definition: to reply/to recover/variant of 回復|回复[hui2 fu4]
to circle/to go back/to turn around/to answer/to return/to revolve/Hui ethnic group (Chinese Muslims)/time/classifier for acts of a play/section or chapter (of a classic book)
to cover/to overflow/to overturn/to capsize
variant of 復|复[fu4]/to reply to a letter

sentences.english: He had cleared them out three years ago but they had all come back in again.
sentences.chinese: 祂三年前曾經把他們趕出去，但不久又回覆舊觀。

sentences.english: Agnes hasn't added or RSVPed to any events yet.
sentences.chinese: 尚未添加或回覆任何事件。

sentences.english: This message contains a request to return a notification about your reception of the message.
sentences.chinese: 這封信要求回覆信件處理通知給寄件者。

sentences.english: Concise, after receipt of the g frequently reply in turn good mood.
sentences.chinese: 簡潔收到克勤的回覆後，心情轉好。

sentences.english: Enemies hit by meteors are knocked down, 25 second recharge.
sentences.chinese: 被隕石雨擊中的敵人將倒地，25秒回覆。

sentences.english: The answer to the girl's letter cost him much time.
sentences.chinese: 回覆那姑娘的信使他花了許多時間。

sentences.english: As difficult as it may be at times, try not to take negative feedback personally.
sentences.chinese: 回覆時儘可能不牽動個人情緒，雖然有時候很難做到。

sentences.english: Seats are limited and will be available on first-reply-first-serve basis.
sentences.chinese: 座位有限及採用先回覆先留位的方法。

sentences.english: In real prices, oil briefly fell back to pre-1973 levels.
sentences.chinese: 實際石油價格甚至短暫回覆到1973年之前的水平。

sentences.english: Women are, in general, more capable of rapidly returning to orgasm immediately after an orgasmic experience.
sentences.chinese: 通常女性在高潮後可以更快的再次回覆高潮。

sentences.english: PAN/PU hollow fibers possess excellent elastic recovery percentage.
sentences.chinese: PU具有較好的彈性回覆率。

sentences.english: A daily conditioning shampoo to help protect hair, leaving it soft and manageable.
sentences.chinese: 能有效改善受損髮質，令秀髮回覆柔順。

sentences.english: The researchers measured how many responses they received by each type of postcard.
sentences.chinese: 研究者們分析了人們對於不同明信片的回覆數量。

sentences.english: This is like above, with better stats and worse regen.
sentences.chinese: 如上述一樣，更好的屬性及稍遜的回覆。

sentences.english: Earl Rambert's response to my offer came today.
sentences.chinese: 今天蘭貝爾特伯爵關於我的要求有了回覆。

sentences.english: The reason for their higher response rates?
sentences.chinese: 這種相對較高的回覆率原因在哪兒呢？

definition: to answer/to reply/Reply to: (in email header)
after the event/in hindsight/in retrospect
to request sb to do sth/please!
to issue a document/document issued by an authority/outgoing messages/(Internet) to post an article online
SMS/text message
to delete/to cancel
variant of 贊|赞[zan4]/to praise
SMS/text message
to solicit/to seek/to request (opinions, feedback etc)/to petition
incoming letter/send a letter here
(Tw) private message/to send a private message
to pass on a story/to communicate a message
to write a letter
email/abbr. for 電子郵件|电子邮件[dian4 zi3 you2 jian4]
to thank/thanks/thank you
to report (an offense to the authorities)/to inform against sb
